entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
